abstract: The financial fallout for Citigroup on its bet on music group EMI may not be as bad as feared, Breakingviews says.
snippet: The financial fallout for Citigroup on its bet on music group EMI may not be as bad as feared, Breakingviews says.
lead_paragraph: Citigroup stopped dancing to the music of the credit boom shortly after it backed the leveraged buyout of EMI, the British music company, in 2007.

headline.main: Could Citi’s Bet on EMI Come Out All Right?
